name: safe_click
title: Safely perform a click
description: Perform a guarded click with scaling awareness and post-click confirmation guidance.

content.text: Reason: {{reason}}. Prepare to click at ({{x}}, {{y}}) using button={{button}} and clicks={{clicks}}. If coordinate_source is 'screenshot', first convert with `convert_screenshot_coordinates` to get logical_x/logical_y. Call `click_screen` accordingly and return success and any warnings. Suggest taking a follow-up screenshot if verification is needed.
